Uses of Class
jmines.model.Tile

Packages that use Tile
jmines.control.listeners This package contains all the objects used to listen the user events on the main and game panels. 
jmines.model This package contains all the business classes needed to compute all the in game calculations (like get the neighbors, the number of surrounding mines etc.). 
jmines.model.events This package contains all the needed classes to handle events that can occurs from the business classes. 
jmines.view.components This package contains all the panels classes : the game panel, the LCD panels, the top panel (containing LCD and smiley button) and the main panel containing the previous panels.
